Author: swirlturls
Text: for ME i save only one picture and it is the picture of me at a weight *right* in the middle of where i should be. i use this picture to show myself that i don't need to go beyond this point and that i look fine in the picture. even if when i am that weight in person i dont see it that way. who knows if this logic will overcome my current bs though.......i have a need to be lower than that even if it's not healthy ðŸ˜”ðŸ¤˜.   i think it really depends on your thought process and what triggers you. i wouldn't use the picture to trigger yourself. i use my photo as a tool to remind myself that it is okay to be at a "good" weight and that i dont have to be underweight to be accepted. i dont think punishing yourself with old photos is good and i would just delete it if thats what you wanna do.

Author: passion8psycho
Text: I save mine. I think its helps me to go back and compare side by side what i look like now to what i look liked years ago. It shows me what a fat cow i was and that ive accomplished so much. Otherwise i just dont see it when i look in the mirror.
